  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Aliyah - A web-enhanced lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aliyah - eine Web-erhöhte Lektion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aliyah - une leçon Web-mise en valeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aliyah - uma lição Web-realçada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aliyah - una lezione Web-aumentata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Aliyah - ένα Ιστός-ενισχυμένο μάθημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aliyah - una lección Web-realzada</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this web-enhanced lesson, learners consider where they would like to settle in Israel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aliya. The lookstein center</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Web-erhöhten Lektion betrachten 
Anfänger, wo sie in Israel abrechnen möchten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon Web-mise en valeur, les 
étudiants considèrent où ils voudraient s'établir en Israel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição Web-realçada, os learners 
consideram onde gostariam de se estabelecir em Israel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione Web-aumentata, i principianti 
considerano dove vorrebbero depositarsi nell'Israele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το Ιστός-ενισχυμένο μάθημα, οι αρχάριοι 
εξετάζουν όπου θα επιθυμούσαν να εγκαταστήσουν στο Ισραήλ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección Web-realzada, los principiantes 
consideran donde quisieran colocar en Israel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aliya. Die lookstein Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aliya. Le centre de lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mais webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aliya. O centro do lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il più webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aliya. Il centro del lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">o πιό ωεψquεστ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">aliya. Το κέντρο lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el ma's webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aliya. El centro del lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
